sections: This Tuesday January 12th at 7pm ET, Democratic Del. Lee Carter will talk to

subscribers about his 2021 run for governor of Virginia. We will also talk to Saikat Chakrabarti, a former top aide to Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, about his new organization pressuring Democrats to deliver on their campaign promises.
Carter is a Marine Corps veteran and self-described socialist who in 2017 defeated a top Republican leader to win a seat in the Virginia House of Delegates. He has
filed paperwork to run for governor
Chakrabarti is a former chief of staff for Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez who is now the president of
.  He recently launched a new PAC called "No Excuses" designed to hold Democrats accountable to their campaign promises. The PAC is running ads against Joe Manchin in West Virginia.
These events are exclusively for Daily Poster subscribers, who will be able to watch the broadcasts live and ask questions in real time.
Please register for the event ahead of time at the Crowdcast link below — and please start posting your questions in the chat room
The live chat with Carter and Chakrabarti will take place on Tuesday 1/12 at 7:00pm ET (4:00pm PST).
To participate, subscribers should go to this link: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/livechatcarter
• Go to the event link and register for the event right now so that you don’t have to deal with login/registration issues at the time of the event.
• Copy and paste the event URL into your browser and copy and paste the event password in. The event URL is: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/livechatcarter
• If possible, please try to use a regular desktop or laptop computer, and use the Chrome browser. You can read more about browser compatibility
• If you want to participate using an iPhone or iPad, you can download Crowdcast’s app

• If you are connected to the live broadcast and have connectivity issues, you should refresh your browser; hit "Help" at the top of the screen (which enters you into compatibility mode); and click the settings cog icon on the bottom right corner and switch to 360p resolution.
